<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>'khor lo ni dang po nyid do zhes man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /de nas brgyad pa dang / dgu pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /de na khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/ cho gar bcas pa rgyas pa dag /ces pa la khro bo ni 'bar phreng la sogs pa'o/ /de'i 'khor lo ni de'i tshogs nyid do/ /de'i cho ga'i
<p>167b.2</p>rim pa ni/ bla mas bstan pa'i rim pa'o/ /rim pa de gsang zhing sba bar bya ba yin pas gsal bar ma bshad do/ /mi shes pa ni rmongs pa ste/ gdams ngag dang rgyud mtha' dag thos pa med pa nyid do/ /da ni 'khor lo bri ba bshad de/ de'i phyir/ 'khor lo rtsibs kyi nang rnams
<p>167b.3</p>ni/ de dang de dag gnyis su sbyar/ zhes pas/ ri mo rnam pa gsum du bya la/ gnyis su sbyor zhes pas 'khor lo nyis rim mo/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang / /zhes pa lte ba la'o/ /de ni 'khor lo'i dbus su yin pas nang ste de nyid kyi nang ni ma yin no/ /mtha' ni kun gyi
<p>167b.4</p>mtha' ste/ dbang la dri la bu dkrol ba'o/ /'khor lo'i mu ran nang dag tu/ /ces pa ni 'khor lo la khro bo dang de'i mthar ma mA dang / de nas ba sha ma na ya ho zhes pa ni man ngag go/ /mur na la zung gcig pa'i yi ge dang skul ba dag dang / /ho la sogs pa phye bas
<p>167b.5</p>dgod de sgra ji bzhin pa'o/ /gzhan du na khro bo bzhi sum cu gnyis su rnam par gnas pa ste/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags/ oM ya mAn+ta krid ya ma rA dza sa do me ya swA hA/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags/ oM pradz+nyA n+ta kr-id ya me do ru Na yo da ya swA hA/ 
<p>167b.6</p>khro bo rta mgrin gyi sngags/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-id ya da yo ni ra yak+she ya swA hA/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags/ oM bag+h+nIn+ta kr-id ya k+she ya ts+tsha ni ra ma ya swA hA/ zhes pa ni de dag dang bcas par bsnyen par gsungs pa yin no/ /de yang nyi ma bzhi bzhir bsnyen pa khri khri bya ba ni gdams
<p>167b.7</p>ngag go/ /mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyig pa sngon po dang / stobs po che dang / bzhi ni pho nya dang po ste/ ri mo rnam gsum yongs su zlum/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ /phyi ma dag la 'khor lo ni/ /drug drug rnam par mdzes par bri/ /'khor lo
<p>168a</p>
<p>168a.1</p>gnyis po la bri ba/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /de yis bshad pa'i tshig dag bri/ /'khor lo tha ma dri med la/ /ring po thung du zung gcig bri/ /de la dbang byed sngags kyang spel/ /zhes bshad pa ni/ khro bo rnam bzhi'i las te/ /rgyud gzhan las kyang
<p>168a.2</p>bshad do/ /khro bo gnod mdzes dang / /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /ki li rnam pa gnyis te bzhi ni/ ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga ste/ 'khor lo de nyid la g.yas nas sngags de nyid bskor bar bri ba ste rim pa snga ma bzhin no/ /de yang 'khor lo la lha bzhir byed pas dbang
<p>168a.3</p>bskur ro/ /gzhan ma tshang ba ni gzhan las shes par bya'o/ /de ni man ngag go/ /sku nas su ni bsgyur te zhes pa 'dir nyi ma rnam pa bzhi'i dus su khro bo re re'i rnam par bya'o/ /de yang dang po g.yon la/ de nas yang g.yon skor ro/ /mthar g.yas bskor te lha rnams so/ /
<p>168a.4</p>tsham ngam ni gsal lo/ /gsang ba rtog pa ste le'u gnyis pa bshad pa'o// //de'i yon tan mtha' yas pa bstan pas 'dul bas de bstan pa'i phyir/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni/ /sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa/ /zhes gsungs pa ni/ khro bo ni rnam pa
<p>168a.5</p>gnyis so/ /de dag nyid rgyal ba ste/ gnod pa la sogs pas brdzi bar mi nus pa'o/ /rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni/ /zhes pa ni/ badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+DA ya/ badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ badzra kro d+ha a tsa la aR+Ya ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ badzra kro d+ha h+ya gr-I ba/ badzra kro d+ha a par/ 
<p>168a.6</p>ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti/ a mr-i tA ki lI ya/ badzra kro d+ha pa tra ya pa tA ya/ badzra tsaN+Da badzra/ badzra na lArka badzra/ badzro Sh+NI ShA badzra/ badzra kuN+Da li badzra/ badzra bi sha na badzra/ badzra ma hA pA lA badzra/ badzra ka
<p>168a.7</p>ra la badzra badzra ya k+sha badzra/ badzro Sh+NI sha tsa kra brti badzra/ badzra pa ta la badzra badzra kI la ya badzra/ badzra kI lA ya ma hA badzri ki lA ya/ zhes pa ste 'di dag la thog mar oM dang / mthar hUM gnyis phaT ces pa ni/ rang gi ming dang ldan pa'i sngags su bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>su gsungs so/ /de bzhin du hriH Sh+T+riH dang / ma mA ya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags su bshad do/ /oM ni de'i thog mar zhes pa ni 'khor lo la bri pa'o/ /drag po'i tshig dang bral zhes pa tsheg drag dang ma sbyar ba'o/ /mnan pa zhes pa thig les brgyan pa'o/ /sngags rnams thams cad ces pa ma mA ya
<p>168b.2</p>sogs pa'o/ /gsal byed pa zhes pa ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis sbyar ba ste/ gsal byed ces bzhi smras la 'dis shes byed pa mi gsal bar byas pa'o/ /snying gar 'dug ces pa 'dug go/ /dus gsum du zhag bdun byas na'o/ /ma mo'i gnas ni dur khrod do/ /nyi ma nub kyi bar khros
<p>168b.3</p>shing dgra'i ming smos/ bzlas zhes pa nyid ni nyi ma bzhir bzlas pa ste/ nyi ma nub nas mi bzlas so/ /zhes pa'o/ /de yang ma mo dang sha za nyi ma nub nas der song zhing / srog 'phrog par bsam mo/ /zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis/ /zhes pa ni ma mo'i gnas der ma mo bdag gi
<p>168b.4</p>drung du bsams la/ zhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa ste zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag rnam par gsal lo/ /le'u gsum pa gsang ba'i rtog par bshad pa'o// //da ni ha'i sgrub pa rab tu bshad de/ de'i phyir gsungs pa/ de nas gzhan yang mchog gyur pa/ /ha la sogs pa'i
<p>168b.5</p>dkyil 'khor ni/ /de las mchog gyur gzhan med pa/ /zhes smos te/ de la 'khor lo dri ma med pa rtsibs bcu gnyis pa bris pa ni/ khro bo'i dngos grub rab tu stsol ba'i thabs myur ba'i phyir mchog tu 'gyur te de'i thabs te/ de nyid 'dod pa len pa dang 'dzin pa'i phyir te/ 
<p>168b.6</p>gang gis brten na des ni 'dod pa'i dgos pa de 'grub par byed pa'o/ /grub pa ni blangs pa'o/ /'phags pa'i dngos grub 'di'i sbyor bas blang bar rung ba ste/ rgyu'i ngo bo rnal 'byor dang ma 'brel kyang gnas pa ni 'dzin pa'o/ /de la/ dang por ha zhes gang bshad pa/ /zhes pa ni rnam
<p>168b.7</p>par rgyal ba'o/ /bskul zhes pa 'phags pas so/ /gang ltar zhe na sngags byung bas snying bskul ba'o/ /sa bon thams cad ces pa khug shig pa'o/ /de nas thog mar bskul ba dang / /de bzhin don ni rim pa ru/ /khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi/ /zhes smos te/ thog mar zhes khug
<p>169a</p>
<p>169a.1</p>shig par ro/ /de nas bsreg par ro/ /de nas skrod par byed par ro/ /go rims kyi don bshad do/ /yi ge bcu gnyis des sbyar ba/ /zhes pa ni gsal byed de/ yal sogs pa brgyad pa'i sa bon de gnyis bcu gnyis dang / dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis su sbyar ba
<p>169a.2</p>la thig les brgyan par bya'o/ /khro chen tshig gi dang por sbyar/ /zhes pa dngos gzhi ste/ rtsibs rnam pa bcu gnyis la khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis su sbyar te/ gtso bor dgod par rab tu lhag pa'i lhar shes par bya'o/ /zung shig pa tshig gnyis pa/ zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha'
<p>169a.3</p>mar dgod/ /ces ba ni zung drug tu sbyar ba la tshig bcu gnyis te/ dngos su khro bo rnam pa bcu gnyis so/ /'khor lo zhes rtsibs bcu gnyis so/ /de yang mthar gsal byed pho nya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi sngags kyi gzhi yang dag par dgod pa'o/ /mtha' med pa yang mu ran dang / rtsibs
<p>169a.4</p>kyi mig tu yod do/ /de'i phyir/ mu ran rtsibs kyi mig rnams su/ /zhes smos so/ /de yang sngags dgod pa yin pas/ sngags las byung ba zhes pa ni/ rang gi sa bon hUM las byung ba ste/ bcu gnyis kyi rgyu mtshan no/ /so so'i las la zhes pa ni/ las bcu gnyis la sogs
<p>169a.5</p>pa mtha' yas kyang 'dir khro bos rnam par gzhag pas bcu gnyis te khug shig pa la sogs pa rnams so/ /de dag kyang mthar dgod pa'o/ /de nas yi ge dgod pa dang / sngags btu ba ni tshul bzhin bya/ /zhes pa ni 'khor lo bri ba'i thabs te/ nang gi lta ba la 'khor lo gsum gyis
<p>169a.6</p>bskor pa'o/ /de yang man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /de dbus de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /zhes pa ni/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bya'o/ /snying po'i rigs kyi mchog yi ge bcu gcig pa ni mtshan rjod par byed pa la gsungs so/ /de'i mthar ni sngags te las kyi sngags te bzhag
<p>169a.7</p>go/ /tshig de yang 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir sngags su bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas mur na gnyis pa la/ /zhes pa la/ ho dag dang haM la sogs pa ste/ de ni dgyes par byed pa mchod pa yin te/ des na snying por bshad la/ de'i dngos grub len pas dgongs pa
<p>169b</p>
<p>169b.1</p>ni zhabs kyis mnan ba ste/ bde bar gshegs pa bya rgod kyi ri la dgyes shing der zhabs kyis bzhin no/ /khro bo zhabs kyis bcags byas pa/ /rtsibs rnams khro bo'i mthu dang ldan/ /zhes pa'i don de ltar ro/ /mu ran gsum dang dbus su de/ /zhes pa la lte ba dang 'dab ma gsum gyi sngags
<p>169b.2</p>te/ mtshan ma brjod pa mthu dang ldan pa rnams so/ /yi ge bcu gnyis rab sbyar ba/ khro bo chen po'i dbus nas zhes gsungs pa ni/ byed pa gsum pa'i stags kyi rten du spel bar bya la/ de'i mthar las kyi tshig dang / bskul ba'i sngags dgod cing bzlas pa yin no/ /de nas gsang sngags
<p>169b.3</p>dgod pa las gzhan pho nya rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ khro bo du ma skul ba ste/ /thams cad kun du don rnams kun/ /grub pa'i phyir ni 'di la gnas/ /zhes pa smos te/ /du ma bskul zhes pa rnam pa bcu gnyis bka' sgo bar bya ste/ rang gi byin rlabs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / khro bo dag
<p>169b.4</p>gi las 'grub par byed pas ni/ de'i phyir/ thams cad kun du don rnams kun/ grub pa'i phyir ni 'di la gnas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gzhan yang rim bzhin du/ /zhes pa la sogs pa smos te/ de la dang po'i ming ni khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng ba zhes pa ni/ rnam par rgyal ba ste/ 
<p>169b.5</p>'gugs par byed pa'i byed pa po/ /kha dog dmar po spros pa yis/ /snying bskul na lcags kyu 'bar ba chen pos 'gugs par byed pa bskul bsngags so/ /rdo rje me yi rgyal po yin/ /zhes pa lho shar gyi dbyig pa sngon po 'jig pa'i me bzhin skems par byed pa yin te las so/ 
<p>169b.6</p>rab tu drag po'i shugs yin te/ /zhes pa ni khro bo ya mAn+ta ka ste/ gshin rje mthar byed pa rlung rab tu drag pa'i shugs che bas dngos po bskyod pa ltar 'dis yul gzhan du skrod pa'o/ /rab tu drag gnon stobs po che/ /zhes pa ni mi g.yo ba ste de'i stobs gyis gzhan gnon pa ni mi
<p>169b.7</p>'gul bar byed pa'o/ /rgya chen khro bo nyid yin te/ /zhes pa khro bo rta mgrin te/ rgya che ba'i srid pa dag 'khrug cing 'thab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /zhes pa ni/ mthu khyad par du gyur pa nyid kyis gzhan rmongs par byed pa ni/ gzhan dregs pa can gyi
<p>170a</p>
<p>170a.1</p>mthu 'joms pa'i phyir ro/ /'jigs par byed pa zhes bshad pa/ /zhes pa ni/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ gzhan dkon mchog la gnod pa skrag pa'i phyir 'jigs byed ces gsungs so/ /byang shar khro bo dril bu sgrogs/ /zhes pa ni khams gsum rnam
<p>170a.2</p>par rgyal ba ste/ dga' bar byed pa'i phyir sgrogs pa yin la 'jigs rten khams las kyang rgyal bas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /phongs pa sgrol ba dgu pa ste/ /zhes pa gnod mdzes stobs po che ste sa 'og gi gter gyis dbul ba 'joms pa'i phyir ro/ /rab tu 'joms
<p>170a.3</p>pa bcu pa yin/ /zhes pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur bas gzhan 'joms pa'i phyir te las so/ /ki li zhes pa bzhag pa ni rnyil bar byed pa'i khro bo ste/ don yod grub pa'i rigs so/ /ki li chen po de bzhin gsungs/ /zhes pa ni 'di yang khro bo chen po phur pa can te/ 
<p>170a.4</p>zhugs par byed pa yin no/ /bcu gnyis su ni gsungs pa yin/ /zhes pa la sogs pa ni/ 'dir bcu gnyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dag bas so/ /pho nya yin pa'i phyir snang byed de/ gtso bos kun bskul ba'i phyir na gnon pa yin no/ /'khod pa na/ bzhi
<p>170a.5</p>pa dang gsum pa la'o/ /kun la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /zhes pa dag ni kun gyi bcu gnyis so/ /de dag la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang sbyar te bsdus pa zhes pa'i don to/ /da ni sngags btu bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa/ gug skyed drug dang ldan par bya/ /zhes pa rgya cher smos te/ gug
<p>170a.6</p>skyed ni dbyangs kyi yi ge dag go/ /sa bon snga ma ni ya la sogs pa'i'o/ /steng du thig le zhes pa ang ngo / /sa bon bdud rtsi zhes pa thig le ste bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /ha ni lhag pa ste/ gtso bo'o/ /dbyangs ni snang byed de/ khro bo gsum po sum cu rtsa drug gam/ bcu bzhi'o/ /dang
<p>170a.7</p>po dkyil 'khor nang nas gcig /ces pa lte ba la mtshan rjod par byed pa'i mthar hUM dbyangs kyi drag pos zhugs pa drag por bri ba'o/ /don kun sgrub byed ces pa hUM gi mthar gsod pa ste mA ra ya dang de'i mthar phaT sbyar ba'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng bzhes pa khro bo de yang sbyar ba 'dra bar
<p>170b</p>
<p>170b.1</p>reg par bya'o/ /gnyis pa zhes pa ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa nas yin la/ dngos su dang por shes par bya'o/ /lhag ma go sla'o/ /sa bon 'di dag rnams kyis bsgrags/ /zhes pa haM hAM la sogs pas sbyar bar rig par bya ba'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'khor lo'i gnas/ /zhes pa lte
<p>170b.2</p>bar gshin rje gshed bzhugs pa ste sngags so/ /de'i bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin ta/ de nang mu ran gsum po dang / dbus kyi mu ran bzang por ldan/ /zhes pa la de zhes pa ka la dang / a dang haM la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de'i'o/ /mu ran gsum ni dril bu'i khyams dang / bdud
<p>170b.3</p>rtsi 'khyil pa'i dang / snang byed kyi 'khor lo dang gsum mo/ /dbus ni ge sar dang lte ba'o/ /de yang mtshan brjod pa ste/ sgrub pa'i 'khor lor shes par bya'o/ /mtha' mu ran drug po ste/ rtsibs kyi zur drug rab bzang ba/ /zhes pa ni 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa la haM la
<p>170b.4</p>sogs pa dang / de'i grwar dbyangs yig bcu gnyis dang / de'i phyi skor la re'u mi gsum cu rtsa bzhi la/ kA li sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / de'i mthar pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa bskul bar rnam par bri'o/ /yang na 'khor lo'i 'dab ma bcu gnyis la gsum gsum dang gcig la
<p>170b.5</p>k+sha ste tshang du 'dug pa'o/ /bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i don mtha' dag sgrub pa thabs dang shes rab las byung ba ste/ bdag med pa'i lha yin no/ /bsdus pa'i don no/ /zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha' mar dgod/ mu ran rtsibs kyi mig rnams
<p>170b.6</p>su/ sngags las byung ba re re'o/ /don rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags/ /gnas su ji ltar bkod pa dag /so so'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /zhes pa'i bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ re'u mig dgu dang de'i phyi skor la zung drug ces
<p>170b.7</p>pas 'khor lo bcu gnyis so/ /de la dbus su rlung gi sa bon dang / lho ru 'jam dpal rdo rje dang / /shar du dngos med yi ge dang / /byang du mkha' 'gro'i yi ge dang / /ma dang e ni bsdus nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su mkhas pas gzhag /g.yon nas dgod pa'i rim
<p>171a</p>
<p>171a.1</p>pa yis/ /sngags las byung ba re re'o/ /me yi sa bon mdun du yin/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i ming yig dang / /de nas khams te dbang chen dang / /rdzogs pa'i yi ge bzhi pa yi/ /gzugs dang yid gnyis drug par bshad/ /rnal 'byor ma dang nges pas bzung / /
<p>171a.2</p>me yi bu dang rlung dang ni/ /sdud po nges dang bcu gnyis pa'o/ /bdun yig gsum gsum mkhas pas btu/ /zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir man ngag go/ /de ltar na bdun pa'i mtha' tsheg dang bcas pa ste/ bcu gnyis po kun gyi sngags so/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni phyogs bzhi po yin la/ 
<p>171a.3</p>rtsibs bcu gnyis ni snang byed du 'dir mkhas pas rig par bya'o/ /des na bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zlos bu'i nyes pa yang med la/ bdun pa yang yin zhing gnyis pa yang de nyid yin no/ /dang po dkyil 'khor nang nas gcig /ces pa nas 'bar ba zhes pa ni/ nang gi ya la sogs pa bcu
<p>171a.4</p>gnyis so/ /sngags kyi mthar zhes pa de'i mthar ro/ /sa bon gnyis pa zhes pa yi ge ma'o/ /me rgyal ni me'i bu ste yi ge ra'o/ /gsum la zhes pa ni ya gsum pa'o/ /shugs drag ces pa ni to'o/ /khro bo che/ de ni stobs po che zhes gsungs/ zhes pa pha rol reg pas stobs che ba'i phyir
<p>171a.5</p>me'o/ /drug pa 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ nang nas gcig blangs te to ni drug pa'o/ /mi thub khro bo zhes pa gzhan gyis thub par dka' bas te yi ge ya'o/ /'jigs pa zhes bya zhes pa ni/ 'jigs par byed pa'i yi ge da'o/ /zur du khro bo zhes pa ni/ byang shar du po'i yi ge yo yin no/ /dgu pa
<p>171a.6</p>phongs pa zhes bya ni/ ma nas te phongs pa sel ba'i sngags ya'o/ /rab 'joms pa zhes bsgrags pa zhes pa ni k+She ste des so/ /ki li zhes pa ni ki li ya ste ya'o/ /mthu khyad par gyur pas ni dngos grub rab tu ster ro/ /ki li chen po zhes pa ni ni ra ste yi ge ra'o/ /tsheg bcas ces pa ni
<p>171a.7</p>de dag kun re rer dgod cing / re re rab tu ba'o/ /dang po ni 'khor lo bstan zhes pa ni mtha'i mu khyud gnyis te/ re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po de las gzhan/ /zhes pa la/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni yi ge phaT bzhi ste/ mtshon cha'i yi ge 'di gzhan dag
<p>171b</p>
<p>171b.1</p>gis gsad par mi nus pas 'chi ba med pa yin no/ /de las gzhan zhes pa/ de las 'phros pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs pa dag go/ /da ni le'u lnga par gong gi sngags dgod pa rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ de'i phyir gsungs pa/ khro bo chen po gcig gi mthar/ /zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/ khro
<p>171b.2</p>bo'i tshig ni yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /bskul cig ces pa ni las kyi tshig go/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni mtshon cha'i yi ge'o/ /'bar phreng ni mtshon dang pho nya'o/ /dang po'i gnas bcu gnyis dag ni/ 'pho ba bcu gnyis la ste/ nyin 'pho ba drug la sngags khri dang brgyad brgya'o/ /nub 'pho
<p>171b.3</p>ba drug la khri dang brgyad brgya ste/ rab kyi tshad 'dis don nges pa ni man ngag la rag las pa yin no/ /bdag nyid kyis thos pa ni dang po'i sngags zhag gcig yin pas na/ gzhan zhag gsum ste/ de ltar na khri phrag brgyad dang / stong phrag drug dang bzhi brgya'o/ /'dir snang byed ni phyogs
<p>171b.4</p>skyong ba bzhi'o/ /tsham ngam bcu gnyis ni las dang sbyar ba yin no/ /gzhan ma bkrol ba dag go sla bar shes so/ /cho ga shes pas zhes pa ni/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ lha rnam pa gsum bskyed cing sku rnam pa gsum rdzogs par bya ba dang gcig /de la gnas pas de dag la mchod pa bya ste/ rdzas rnams
<p>171b.5</p>bsangs la/ thog par sman a ka ru dang sbyar ba'am/ tsan+dan dang sbyar bar 'thor 'thung dbul te/ oM hUM pra ti dza swA hA/ de nas ar+g+ha dbul te/ oM hUM hri ka la ma tha na swA hA/ dri dbul ba/ oM hUM hri shri kha khA swA hA/ spos dbul ba/ oM hUM hraM du pa ri ka ha swA hA/ lha bshos dbul ba/ oM bi mAn+ta ka
<p>171b.6</p>te jo ba len ni swA hA/ mar me dbul ba/ oM hUM dzIM dzIM ha swA hA/ me tog dbul ba/ oM ka ra la rAd na ha swA hA/ zhes pa zhes bzhes bdag gis phul ba'i me tog 'di/ ar+g+ha 'di bzhes su gsol ba zhes su gsol/ gnyis po'o/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ phreng ba 'bigs pa'am/ 'dzin
<p>171b.7</p>pa'am/ 'gugs pa dag gos kha sbyar dbye shing bsdus la/ ye shes sems dpa' phyung la rten med pa'i rnam par shes pa bdag gi rlung la zhon nas byung ba mtshan ma la bstim zhing bcug la/ mtshon cha 'am/ phur bur phreng ba gyur pa las gnod pa mtshan ma la bsam mo/ /bzlas pa ste/ 
<p>172a</p>
<p>172a.1</p>gsum pa'o/ /'khrul 'khor gyi rim pa dag dang / mnan pa'am/ bsreg pa ni cho ga bzhi pa'o/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes pa ni/ de'i rtog pa dang por gsungs pa'i khro bo rnams kyi las bshad pa'i las kyi rim pa'i cho ga rgyas pa nas bsdus pa'o/ /cho ga 'di ni zhes pa
<p>172a.2</p>las bshad pa'o/ /de gsang ba ste de bas gsang ba 'khor lo'o/ /de bas mchog ni bzlas pa'o/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa/ zhes pa 'jam dpal gyi ste/ de'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rtog pa ni de'i rtog pa'o/ /cho ga'i rim pa ste/ de'i las su gtogs pa 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ste/ 
<p>172a.3</p>le'u bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o// //'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i sku mnga' shes rab mtshon char ldan/ /'gro ba byams pa'i thugs mnga' thugs rje kun la snyoms/ /de sras bdag la bdud rtsi skyed pa bla ma rin chen la/ /bdag gis mog yis bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /'gro la
<p>172a.4</p>phan phyir 'grel pa 'di byas pas/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar gyur na bshags par bgyid/ /gal te 'di yis 'gro la phan gyur na/ /dge ba de kun bsdus te byang chub chen por bsngo/ /slob dpon lha spas kyis mdzad pa sgrub thabs kun gyi gter zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //rgya
<p>172a.5</p>gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rig pa gzhon nus bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //lho phyogs kyi yul be tar sku 'khrungs pa/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po slob dpon gyi mchog klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas bsdus pa'o/ /
<p>172a.6</p>@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya many+dzu shrI gu h+ya tan+t+ra s+ya maN+Da la bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi ni/ /khro bo yi ni bsnyen pa dag /sngon du
<p>172a.7</p>bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas 'di yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dngos grub dam pa sbyin mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum po 'khrug par mdzad/ /yi dgas dmar po zhes bya yi/ /tshad du 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gnas ni gang du 'grub 'gyur ba/ /sngags pas
<p>172b</p>
<p>172b.1</p>thog ma nyid du ni/ /de yi gnas ni brtag par bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /mchod rten 'gram dang lha khang 'gram/ /thibs po lam srang gnyis pa dang / /skyed mos tshal dang ri yi rtse/ /chu yi 'gram mam nags tshal dang / /lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang
<p>172b.2</p>rung / /ba lang lhas sam yul gyi sa/ /khyad par du ni yul gtsang sar/ /yang ni yid ni rab 'jug pa/ /der ni dkyil 'khor rab tu bya/ /shar dang byang ni dma' ba'am/ /kha dog snum par rab tu bzang / /ba tshwa med cing ma gas pa/ /dang por mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /dag
<p>172b.3</p>pa'i gzugs ni rab bzung ste/ /de nyid gsum brjod sa la ni/ /lag gis brdab pa dag tu bya/ /rab 'gyur lha mo sbran par bya/ /skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa
<p>172b.4</p>yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi tshogs bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa yi/ /sa yi lha mo ji bzhin du/ /sa las rab tu 'thon pa ni/ /rkang bkru mchod yon mnyes par byas/ /sngon gyi dus na de bzhin
<p>172b.5</p>gshegs/ /shAkya seng ges sa 'dir ni/ /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ /chos rnams mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas bzhin/ /de nas rig 'dzin can gyis ni/ /sems can don du dkyil 'khor byed/ /sa yi lha mos dbang mdzod cig /bdud rnams zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /sa bslang
<p>172b.6</p>ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rig 'dzin nan gyis ni/ sa ni yang dag sbyang bar bya/ /khro bo yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /'byung bo'i gtor ma byin nas kyang / /nga ni rdo rje 'di ming ste/ /slob ma dag dang sems can gyi/ /don du dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /yi dgas phal chen zhes bya bzhengs/ /gang
<p>172b.7</p>dag sa 'dir gnas pa yi/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /nam mkha' lding dang sha za'i tshogs/ /'byung po mang po thams cad kun/ /mchod sbyin bden pa 'di long la/ /'di ru ma gnas gzhan du deng / /khro bo 'bar ba'i bka' byung gis/ /skad cig gis ni myur du deng / /gang dag
<p>173a</p>
<p>173a.1</p>bsam pa dang ldan zhing / /khro bo chen po'i bka' gcog pa/ /myur du 'gro bar mi sems ni/ /spyi bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas so/ /oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ bgegs kyi phyogs nas brjod nas kyang / /khro bo 'bar ba'i bzhin gyis ni/ /rkang
<p>173a.2</p>mthil hUM las rdo rje mchog /'bar bas bgegs ni bskrad par bya/ /sa la sngags chu gtor nas kyang / /sa yi dbus su khru gang brko/ /sol ba la sogs ro dag ni/ /bsal nas sngags kyi chu yis gtor/ /rin chen lnga stsogs gang ba yi/ /bum pa'i nang du bcug nas kyang / /rang
<p>173a.3</p>gis kyang ni dgang bar bya/ /dri yi chu yis gtor bar bya/ /ba yi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /lci bas kyang ni byug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur lhag tsam du/ /kun du sbyor ba brtsam par bya'o/ /sa sbyang ba'o/ /de nas mkhas pas sta gon gyi/ /las ni gnyis pa rab tu brtsam/ /lnga
<p>173a.4</p>yi rdzas la sbyar ba yi/ /dri yi chus ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /de nas tsan+dan dmar pos kyang / /pad+ma dag gi gzugs su bya/ /yi dgas 'dzin pa'i sngags dag gis/ /me tog dmar po dbus stsogs bzhag /de nas mchod yon gzhag par bya/ /me tog sbu gu dri zhim dang / /a ga
<p>173a.5</p>ru dang sbyar ba yi/ /gu gul bdug pa'ang de bzhin no/ /mar me mar gyi mar me mchog /dri yi don du tsan+dan mchog /tsan+dan dkar po dmar po yi/ /gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs/ /sbyar thug la sogs de bzhin no/ /me tog chur bcas arka dang / /ras la stsogs pa thams cad do/ /de
<p>173a.6</p>ltar de ni tshogs bsags nas/ /slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas/ /smyung ba byas te mnyam gzhag pas/ /khro bo'i bsrung bas byin gyis brlab/ /'di ltar rtog pa zhib mo las/ /gsungs pa'i rim pas khro bo nyid/ /bskyed dang spyan drangs la stsogs kyis/ /lha de 'bad de
<p>173a.7</p>mnyes par bya/ /de nas 'bad de gsol ba gdab/ /dkon mchog gsum dang rigs gsum gyi/ /mgon po de bzhin gshegs dang bcas/ /gang dag rigs kyi khro bo'i tshogs/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /slob ma la ni phan pa dang / /khro bo khyod la mchod pa'i

<p>173b.1</p>phyir/ /bdag ni nang par dkyil 'khor bgyid/ /byin gyis brlab cing gnang mdzad cing / /thugs rjes rjes su gzung du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /lha gnas pa'i rim pa'o/ /gser sogs rin chen las byung ba'i/ /bum pa bzang po ma nyams pa'i/ /khrus kyis
<p>173b.2</p>gtsang mar byas pa yi/ /dri yi chus kyang byug par bya/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa gnyis/ /pad+ma'i steng du be con dang / /las kyi rgya gram bri bar bya/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyis mgul pa dkri/ /dang po 'od gsal rgyu las ni/ /kha dog dkar po baM las byung / /ji bzhin dbyibs su [(]bskyid [,]bskyed [)]
<p>173b.3</p>nas su/ /de yi nang du pad+ma bsam/ /pad+ma'i lte bar nyi ma la/ /hUM las byung ba'i khro bo bskyed/ /khro bo gnyis po de dag ni/ /rang mtshan kha dog ldan par bya/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab bcug nas/ /mchod yon la sogs de la dbul/ /so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas nas chu yi

<p>173b.7</p>chen gyis ni bskyab du gsol/ /slob ma'i tshig gsan bla ma bzang / /brtse bas bu la mngon phyogs nas/ /dang ba'i bzhin gyis 'di skad smra/ /bu gcig 'dir shog theg chen gyi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod gyur te/ /rig pa 'dzin pa spyod ba'i tshul/ /khyod la yang ni bshad par bya/ /dus gsum byon
<p>174a</p>
<p>174a.1</p>pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sems can phan phyir gang bzhugs pa/ /kun gyis thabs chen sngags kyi ni/ /cho ga mkhyen nas thams cad mkhyen/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med pa/ /bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'dul byed pa/ /
<p>174a.2</p>khyod kyis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de skad spro ba bskyed nas su/ /slob mas phyag 'tshal la sogs pa/ /yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis sdom pa dpog ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /dkyil
<p>174a.3</p>'khor lha dang slob dpon dag /khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /sems can thams cad sgrol byed pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa/ /yang dag brtan por gzung bar bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gzung / /srog chags gsod dang ma byin len/ /'dod pa brdzun rnams mi
<p>174a.4</p>bya'o/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni btung ba spang bar bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi nyes pa rnam bzhi dang / /yid kyi rnam gsum bsrung bar bya/ /sems can 'tshe ba ma lus spang / /sems can don la mngon dga' zhing / /theg pa chen po'i lam la
<p>174a.5</p>gnas/ /dam pa nye bar mnyes pa dang / /'dul ba'i don ni ma lus bya/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha rnams/ /'gom pa'am brdzi bar mi bya'o/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs gsang ba gang / /gsang ba brtul zhugs
<p>174a.6</p>brtan por gyis/ /slob ma brtan po rab dang bas/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sdom pa kun/ /'khor bas skyo ba'i yid bzhag nas/ /nges par legs pa'i don du gzung / /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa mang po kun nas bshags/ /dge ba kun la yi rang
<p>174a.7</p>ngo / /sangs rgyas byang chub gzung bar gyis/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /mnyam med byang chub sems ni bskyed/ /sems can ma lus don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /sems can ma bsgral dpag med pa/ /mya ngan

<p>174b.1</p>'das la dgod par bya/ /lus ngag yid kyi nyes rnams bsdams/ /bag med chang rnams btung ba yang / /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bgyi/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /bla ma brnyas par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma la sogs mi 'gom mo/ /rig pa 'dzin
<p>174b.2</p>pa'i sdom pa kun/ /tshul chen sngags pas gsungs pa kun/ /kun nas kun du gzung bar bgyi/ /las dang bka' stsal ma lus bgyi/ /spyi gtsug la sogs gnas rnams su/ /khro bo'i sngags rnams gzhag par bya/ /so shing srung skud de bzhin sbyin/ /ku sha'i stan la cho ga bzhin/ /
<p>174b.3</p>slob ma gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /ji ltar rim par dkyil 'khor la/ /mchod yon la sogs phul nas kyang / /yid kyis nam mkhar bzhugs nas ni/ /nad par mkhas pas thig gdab po/ /dkar po dmar po sngon po yi/ /kha dog gsum pa'i skud pa ni/ /ras bal la sogs btsos
<p>174b.4</p>pas bya/ /stong pa rgyu las yi ge gsum/ /so so'i cha ru bskyed nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs dag bsam par bya/ /nam mkhar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /ye shes thig skud bkug ste gzhug /dri yi phyogs la sogs pas mchod/ /gnyis su med pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /
<p>174b.5</p>thig skud sum sgril mdzes pa yis/ /mkhas pas thig btab phun sum tshogs/ /shar gyi sgo ru gnas nas kyang / /khro bo'i skur ni rang byas nas/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya/ /g.yon gyi khu tshur lte bar bsten/ /las kyi khro bor bsams nas su/ /thog mar shar nas
<p>174b.6</p>nub du'o/ /de 'og lho nas byang du ste/ /nam mkhar thig gnyis gdab par bya/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs de bzhin gshegs/ /'gro don dus la bab par bskul/ /de nas yang ni de bzhin te/ /thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas/ /shar lho yi ni mtshams nas kyang / /nub nas
<p>174b.7</p>byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /thig gis rab tu tshad byas te/ /gru bzhi par ni thig gdab bo/ /rim pa gcig pa mdzes pa la/ /sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi/ /dbus su pad+mo bri bar bya/ /pad+mo dang ni phyogs bzhi'i sgo/ /the tshom med par
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>mnyam par bya/ /snying po mdzes pa'ang de bzhin te/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du gdag /cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor de/ /kun du thig gis btab nas kyang / /mchod yon bzhengs te rab tu gshegs/ /yi ge gsum dang myuHyis dgrol/ /oM AHhUM muHdur khrod
<p>175a.2</p>rdzas kyi thal bas ni/ /phyi nas kun du bri bar bya/ /yi dgas phal chen gsang mchog ni/ /dkyil 'khor mkhas pas nub mo bri/ /khru gang la sogs rim pa nas/ /khru ni brgyad pa'i bar du ste/ /de las lhag pa yong mi bri/ /las kyi rim pa so sor bri/ /dur khrod thal bas
<p>175a.3</p>sbyar ba'i tshon/ /kha dog gsum ni bcos par byas/ /stong pa nyid kyi rgyu las te/ /kha dog gsum ni yi ges bskyed/ /ye shes tshon dag bkug nas kyang / /gnyis med byas la mchod yon dbul/ /khro bo'i yi ge dag bzlas la/ /rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings
<p>175a.4</p>kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /sems can khams ni sgrol bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /gshin rje gshed ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su kha dog gsum/ /ji bzhin legs par bris nas kyang / /khro bo'i sngags kyis brtag par bya/ /nyes pa
<p>175a.5</p>kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /tshon gyi las ni de nas brtsam/ /dbus su legs par gzhag nas kyang / /khro bos kyang ni byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags bzlas/ /de bzhin thig las gsum bri ste/ /dbus kyi pad+mo gser gyi mdog /'dab ma dag ni
<p>175a.6</p>dmar pos brgyan/ /snying po ze ba mdzes pa de/ /gser gyi kha dog bzhin du bya/ /thams cad dur khrod thal bas bskor/ /sgo dang phyogs mtshams la sogs pa/ /rigs ni dbye bas phye bar bri/ /rta babs me yi phreng ba'i mthar/ /thams cad rigs kyi kha dog bya/ /lho phyogs
<p>175a.7</p>kyi ni sgo phye la/ /lhag ma rnams ni bcad par bri/ /gzhan yang yi dgas lhag pa yi/ /pad+mo'i lte bar bri bar bya/ /de bzhin phyogs sgo nang dag dang / /phyogs rnams de dag thams cad du/ /yi dgas bzhi dang mgo med do/ /dur khrod thal bas spags te bri/ /byang shar la
<p>175b</p>
<p>175b.1</p>sogs grwa rnams su/ /mkhas pas be con phyag rgya bri/ /gal te bri bar mi nus na/ /yi dgas phal chen dbus dag tu/ /pad+ma lnga bris gang yin pa'o/ /de yi steng du yi dgas ni/ /yi dgas kyi ni sngags mchog gis/ /bsam pa dag ni byas kyang rung / /grwa yi dbyug pa bzhi po yang / 
<p>175b.2</p>sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya/ /de bzhin sngags kyis thams cad bya'o/ /gal te dri bar nus kyang ni/ /sngags nyid steng du gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi yi dgas bzhi po yang / /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga'o/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par shes nas
<p>175b.3</p>ni/ /rnam rgyal khro bo'i bum pa ni/ /lho yi sgo yi dbus su gzhag /las kyi bum pa byang shar te/ /bgegs srungs zhes ni brjod la gzhag /mar me mar gyi rgyu las te/ /snying po 'jam pa brgyad kyis bskong / /lha bshos dag kyang de yi grangs/ /bdug pa mchog dang a ga ru/ /de yi
<p>175b.4</p>grangs su mnyam par gzhag/ /tsan+dan dkar dmar de bzhin blang / /mchod pa'i khyad par gzhan yang ste/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du gzhag /nya dang sha dang zan dron tshogs/ /khyad par gtor ma dag kyang gzhag /yi dgas phal chen phyi rol du/ /chu dang bcas pa'i me tog gzhag / 
<p>175b.5</p>ji ltar cho ga zhib mo bzhin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i yo byad gzhag /gnas dang gnas su de bzhin brgyan/ /de 'og slob dpon bdag nyid kyis/ /khrus kyi cho ga byas nas kyang / /rang gi snying po sngags kyis ni/ /thams cad yan lag sngags kyis bya/ /smyung bas byang chub sems
<p>175b.6</p>ldan pas/ /ji ltar rim pas bskyed nas kyang / /mjug tu khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /sngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas/ /rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol/ /yi dgas kyi ni spyi bor yang / /me tog dmar po bzhag par bya/ /blo ldan gyis ni khro bo la'o/ /de nas tsan+dan dmar
<p>175b.7</p>bo dbul/ /tsan+dan gyis ni gtor ba yi/ /me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i snying pos dbul/ /'byung po'i gtor ma khro bo la/ /phul nas yi dgas phal chen gyi/ /phyi rol du ni mkhas pa yis/ /sme gtor rnams kyang dbul bar bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i snying po nyid/ /
<p>176a</p>
<p>176a.1</p>brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /khro bo'i gtso la phyogs nas ni/ /de nas yang ni bdug pa 'bul/ /cho gas khrus byas smyung ba yi/ /slob ma dag gi bsod nams kyang / /sngags kun gyis ni gzi byin bskyed/ /khro bo yi ni snying po yi/ /lag gnyis me
<p>176a.2</p>tog byin nas ni/ /gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs par bya/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis sgo drung gzhag/ /bla ma rdo rje 'chang gis kyang / /mtshog ma spyi gtsug la sogs la/ /sngags rnams ma lus gzhag par bya/ /bsang gtor sngon 'gro de bzhin te/ /rin chen gser stsogs yon
<p>176a.3</p>mchog dag /'bad pas bla ma la phul nas/ /'jug pa'i sngon du gsol ba gdab/ /'di ni dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab sprul pa'i/ /bla ma la ni phyag 'tshal te/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'tshal/ /'jam
<p>176a.4</p>dpal khro bo mi bzad pa/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog /yi dgas mang po zhes bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /oM AHhUM zhes pas bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma bdag nyid dngos grub kyi snod du bya ba'i phyir na 'di dag bya ste/ /bla na med pa'i sangs
<p>176a.5</p>rgyas dang / /chos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /'gro ba ma lus pa yi skyabs/ /bdag ni gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /de nas skyabs ni gsum po dang / /dkyil na gshin rje gshed gcig pu/ /dpa' bo khro bo mi bzad pa/ /de dag kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum
<p>176a.6</p>dang khro bo ni/ /rtag tu bdag ni mchod par bgyid/ /bla ma la yang de bzhin du/ /sgo gsum dang ba'i sems kyis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor la me tog gtor ro/ /lus kyi nyes pa gsum rnams dang / /ngag gi bzhi po nyes pa spyad/ /yid kyi nyes spyad gsum po ste/ /lus kyi sgrib
<p>176a.7</p>pa ma lus bshags/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas 'phags pa yi/ /thar par byas pa'i dge ba dang / /thams cad thar bar gyur pa yi/ /bdag gzhan dge la yi rang ngo / /sa bon mchog las rang byung ba'i/ /thar par gyur pa'i dge ba'i tshogs/ /sems can mya ngan 'das pa'o/ / 
<p>176b</p>
<p>176b.1</p>byang chub chen por yongs su bsngo/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag par ni/ /sems can phan phyir gang bzhugs rnams/ /thabs kyis mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /ma smin pa rnams smin pa dang / /smin pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /dam chos bdud rtsi 'byung ba yi/ /
<p>176b.2</p>gsung ni du mar bsgrag par mdzod/ /de nas slob dpon gyis sngar gyi sdom pa thams cad brjod de sbyin par bya'o/ /slob mas khas blangs pa brjod pas/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bya/ /de ring phan chad bu khyod ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su zhugs/ /nga yi ye shes chen po sbyin/ /
<p>176b.3</p>de yis dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /gang dag dkyil 'khor ma zhugs la/ /gsang ba 'di ni smra ba min/ /bag med sems kyis smras gyur na/ /dngos grub cung zad thob mi 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig chu blud de/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na
<p>176b.4</p>sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'thob/ /'thung cig rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ /dri dang me tog ldan pa'i chus/ /lag pa g.yas pas blud par byas/ /oM AHhUM/ dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga yin gyis/ /nga yis ji ltar
<p>176b.5</p>bka' stsal mchog /mnyan dang bsgrub pa dag kyang gyis/ /khyod ni nam yang nga la ni/ /ma dad pa yi sems rnams spang / /slob ma mos pa med pa yis/ /dngos grub ring bar rgyal bas gsungs/ /ji ltar dngos grub thob mi thob/ /rgyud las 'byung bzhin phra rnams brtag /las
<p>176b.6</p>kyi bya ba rab 'jug pa/ /rim pa 'di las shes par 'gyur/ /slob ma mtshan ldan nyes skyon med/ /shin tu bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ba yi rnam lnga blud nas ni/ /de 'og smyung bar gang gnas pa/ /zhim pa'i dri yis lus la byug /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par byas/ /
<p>176b.7</p>shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la/ /ku sha'i stan la gzhag par bya/ /de yi lag gnyis snyim pa'i nang / /tsan+dan gtor ma'i me tog sbyin/ /a gar nag po'i du bas kyang / /de nas myur du sngags brjod de/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /snod la dbab pa'i las bya'o/ /
<p>177a</p>
<p>177a.1</p>oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM ya mAn+ta ka kr-iN+Di a be sha hUM phaT/ snod la babs gyur de nas ni/ /dge dang mi dge dri bar bya/ /'byung ba byung ba bden par smra/ /sems can chen po 'di gyis la/ /'di min zhes ni rjod par byed/ /de nas khro bo
<p>177a.2</p>mchog de la/ /me tog ldan pa'i ar+g+ha dbul/ /de nas bde gshegs bstan pa yi/ /dam tshig kyang ni bstan par bya/ /snod kyis thos nas de nas su/ /de btang nas ni sa la 'gyel/ /rig pa khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /grub pa de las bzhud par 'gyur/ /de las slob
<p>177a.3</p>mas me tog ni/ /gshin rje gshed la gtor ba ni/ /rang gi snying pos me tog nyid/ /dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya/ /oM AHhUM/ lho phyogs sgo nas de bzhin te/ /de nas gdong ras bsal nas kyang / /dbyug pa'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de bzhin
<p>177a.4</p>te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de ring nyid/ /khyod ni nan tan mig phye ste/ /nga yis ji bzhin mig phye bas/ /mi bzad dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyis/ /oM AHhUM/ de nas be con gyi phyag rgya bstan par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi dam tshig ni/ /mngon par bstan pa sngar byas
<p>177a.5</p>nas/ /lag pa g.yas pa cho ga bzhin/ /legs par rab tu bcing bar bya/ /rig 'dzin dag gis rtag par ni/ /lag pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis/ /mthe bong legs par spras nas ni/ /rab tu bsdams pa bzang po bcing / /cho ga shes pas be con rgya/ /snying po
<p>177a.6</p>sngags sam logs shig tu/ /sngags pa phyag rgya'i sngags gyis bcing / /gzhan du yang ni ma yin no/ /oM na mo bud+d+ha/ d+har+m+mA/ saM g+ha b+h+yaH/ sat+tha ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya/ a g+ni dz+wa li ta dzi ha pra ta shrI ri hUM hUM phaT/ de ltar be con phyag rgya dang sngags bstan nas dkyil 'khor
<p>177a.7</p>yang yi dgas phreng ba la sogs pa thams cad bstan par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis/ /bstan pa'i be con rgya bcings nas/ /lho phyogs sgo nas slob ma yis/ /dri sogs mchod pa ma lus dbul/ /de nas sngags pa dbang bskur la/ /chu dang me tog bcas pa yi/ /
<p>177b</p>
<p>177b.1</p>snying po gdab pa'i bum pa yis/ /khro bos dbang bskur mchog sbyin no/ /oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha bany+dza hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo'i snying po yis/ /cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur la/ /bdug pa me tog phreng ldan par/ /snying po de la sbyin par bya/ /oM a kro te ka ya la sogs/ /sngags
<p>177b.2</p>kyi don ni bcu bdun pa/ /khro bo de nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis/ /khro bo dran par bya zhing bzlas/ /gzhan yang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog /smyung bar byang chub sems ldan las/ /skye bo med ba'i nags tshal du/ /ru rag+sha yi phreng thogs shing / /lag pa dri yis byugs nas
<p>177b.3</p>kyang / /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten lha la phyag mi 'tshal/ /glang po la yang lam mi bzur/ /rgyal po la yang phyag mi btsal/ /bgrod dka' ba nas bgrod par byed/ /khro bo 'ba' zhig sems byed cing / /spyod dang brtul zhugs brten par gyis/ /zhes brtul
<p>177b.4</p>zhugs sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma dbang thob des/ /gshin rje gshed ni khro bo yi/ /tshul las bdag ni don yod de/ /lha khyod kun la bde mdzad pa/ /khro bo khyod ni bdag gis mnos/ /mnos zhes khro bo me tog gtor/ /de nas slob mas phyag byas te/ /ci nus yon mchog dbul bar
<p>177b.5</p>bya/ /sngags pas bla ma mchod byas na/ /dngos grub 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /slob ma snying po byin nas ni/ /phreng ba tsan+dan la sogs pas/ /mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /phyi rol du ni sngar bzhag pa'i/ /dri chu la sogs bkang ba'i snod/ /de nas mchod pa phul nas ni/ /'jam
<p>177b.6</p>dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa/ /mthu rtsal drag po slar yang gtang / /de btang ba yi 'og tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor du yang mchod yon dbul/ /rgya cher sa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi/ /rig sngags 'chang gis de ltar ni/ /mchod pa de ltar legs par bya/ /
<p>177b.7</p>snod ni gser sogs rin chen du/ /tshon rtsi legs par bsdu bar byas/ /gtsang ma'i chu bo la stsogs por/ /phyi nas kyang ni rnam lngas byug /tshul chen rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i cho ga byas/ /chung zad dge ba gang thob 'dis/ /'jam dpal khro
<p>178a</p>
<p>178a.1</p>bo'i gnas thob shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon don yod pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAM many+dzu shrI g+ho Sha s+ya kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka ho ma bi d+hiH/ 
<p>178a.2</p>bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la du ma dang rdzas so sor bya ba ni spyir gsal lo/ /de la zhi ba la ni thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang la zabs su de'i
<p>178a.3</p>phyed par byas te/ dkar por bsgyur ro/ /rgyas pa la de'i nyis 'gyur du bya ste/ dbyibs gru bzhi ser por bya'o/ /de gnyis kyi mu ran yang zhi ba la sor bzhi'i 'phang la rgyas pa la nyis 'gyur ro/ /dbang dang drag po'i sor bcu'i rgya dang lnga'i zabs su bya'o/ /kha khyer dang mu ran ni 'phang
<p>178a.4</p>du sor gsum du mtshungs so/kha dog dmar nag dang sngon po la dbyibs ni zla ba phyed pa dang / gru gsum yin no/ /thams cad kyi nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba ser por bya'o/ /lte bar yi dgas 'dzin pa dang / /'dab ma dmar po la mtshams kyi bzhir be con no/ /kha khyer la zhi
<p>178a.5</p>ba la 'khor lo/ /rgyas pa la ni rin chen/ dbang la pad+ma 'dab rgyas/ drag po la rtse gsum mo/ /mu ran la yi dgas phreng bar mtshungs so/ /de'i phyi rol gru bzhi sgo bzhir/ yi dgas so so bar sbrel te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las bzhin no/ /thab khung brtsegs nas nang ku sha
<p>178a.6</p>rtse mo yang phyogs so so bar bstan la bud shing so so bas bris pa'i dbyibs bzhin brtsig go/ /de nas rdzas so so ba yang g.yas su gzhag par bya/ /mchod pa so so g.yon du gzhag /mdun du mar so so ba dang / yon chu dang gzar bu rnam gzhag go/ /de nas sngags pas gos
<p>178a.7</p>so so ba gon te/ /rgyan yang de bzhin no/ /stan so so ba la kha yang zhi ba shar/ rgyas pa lho/ /dbang nub/ drag po byang du bltas te/ sgrub thabs kyi gzhung la 'jug par bya'o/ /bstod pa yan chad rdzogs pa dang / lha gtang ba'i cho ga bya ste/ las dang mthun pa'i me bus la spar
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>te/ rgyun gyi me'am rgyu las brtag /dngul phor rgyu yi snod kyis bla/ /gser snod dge zhing bkra shis par/ /rgyal rigs me'am rgyu las brtag /rje'u rigs smad 'tshong rgyu las brtag /zangs sogs dbang la blang bar bya/ /gdol ba'i me'am dur khrod me/ /lcags dang
<p>178b.2</p>thod par blang bar bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bsang ba dang / /yi dgas bkod nas mtshon chas bsrungs/ /dkar po lo ma'i shing bzang la/ /mtho gang tshad du mnyam byas pa'i/ /yam sreg shing des zhi ba spar/ /u du ma bA ra byang chub shing / /nyis 'gyur gyis ni
<p>178b.3</p>rgyas par spar/ /mya ngan med stsogs seng ldeng bzang / /sor gsum tshad du dbang drag mtshungs/ /drag po dur khrod tsher ma yi/ /yam sreg shing bu mar spar bya/ /de yang rlung ring phyogs bltas te/ oM ba ya be/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ raM dz+wa la raM zhes rlung yab dang ldan par bya'o/ /
<p>178b.4</p>de nas me de bsangs la/ bdag dam tshig sems dpa'i skur bskyed pa 'jig rten pa nyid du bya'o/ /de nas me'i dbus su paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar la nyi ma/ dbang drag la zla ba/ zhi rgyas la nyi mar bsam mo/ /de nas mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya la mthe bong gis srin
<p>178b.5</p>lag la mnan te/ e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi ta/ ag+na ye bA ba ka /A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ zhes pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/ /de nas bsang gtor/ oM hUM dzi na dzig/ /zhes gtor ro/ /zhal bsil ba/ ag+na ye/ pA pa ka ma hA pra te dza swA hA/ de nas gdan
<p>178b.6</p>dbul te/ ag+na ye ma hA te dza/ sar+b+ba kA ma sA d+ha na/ sa twa ar+tha A di ti ye swA hA/ me tog thab tu gtor te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs par brtag go/ /de nas mar la gzar bu lan bdun nam gsum du dbul lo/ /na mas+sa man+ta bud+d+ha a g+na ye pA pa ka raM raM swA hA/ de bzhin
<p>178b.7</p>du rgyas pa la ni ma he na tra zhes sbyar ro/ /dbang la ni ma ma ra zhes sbyar ro/ /drag po la ni kro d+ha ni zhes sbyar ro/ /de ltar me 'bar ba'i dgang blugs phul te/ me 'bar ba dang ku sha dgram ste/ zhi ba la shar nas/ rgyas pa la lho nas/ dbang la nub nas/ drag po la byang nas dgram par bya'o/ /zhi rgyas rtsa ba dang bcas te byas/ 
<p>179a</p>
<p>179a.1</p>dbang drag phyed mar gtub pa'i rtse mos bskor ro/ /oM i me ka sha/ /shu pa dib bya/ pu ta pra ma hA/ pa ping tri na/ rat+na trA ya/ ra ta hi ti ni/ pra d+hi pi dzi dang / gar pa b+ha gar pa b+ha ban+du swA hA/ de nas phur pa bzhi yang sgo bzhir gzugs/ /mda' bzhi yang gra bzhir
<p>179a.2</p>btsugs la/ tshon skud bre zhing bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brjod do/ /des ni bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod pa so so ba dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas sngar yam sreg shing gi tshad kyi rigs kyi yam shing dbul lo/ /zhi ba la mar dkar po/ /rgyas pa la mar
<p>179a.3</p>ser po/ /dbang la shing mar/ drag po la mi tshil bzhu ba'am tsha ba'i mar ro/ /de nas til dang / yungs kar dang / de nas zho dang / /'bras chan dang / de nas ku sha/ de nas dU ra ba/de nas nas/ de nas gro/ de nas 'bru/ de nas sran ma/ 'bras ma grugs pa/ de nas star ga
<p>179a.4</p>dang / snying zho sha dang / gla gor zho sha dang / shing thog la sogs pa rnams dang / sngags gcig gam so so yang rung ste 'bul lo/ /de la gcig ni/ oM ag+na ye pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ /ba shaM ku ru baM/mA ra ya hUM phaT/ so so ba/ badzra ya dzA ya
<p>179a.5</p>swA hA/ yam shing / oM ag+ni swA hA/ mar ro/ sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ til dang nyungs kar/ sar+b+ba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang zan/ a pra ti ha ta badzrA a swA hA/ ku sha/ badzra A yu She swA hA/ dUr ba'i'o/ /ma hA be+e gA ya swA hA/ nas so/ /badzra g+hasma rA ya swA hA/ gro/ badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ 
<p>179a.6</p>'bru dag go/ /ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ sran ma'o/ /badzra puSh+TA ya swA hA/ 'bras ma grugs pa'o/ /ma hA shri pa ya pa ye swA hA/ star ga dang / gla gor zho sha dang / dza' ti pha la dang / shing thog btogs te zhal nyid du dbul te/ dang por oM dang tha mar swA hA bzhag ste mchod/ 
<p>179a.7</p>de nas mar ro/ /de nas 'bar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsgom mo/ /'jig rten pa'i me lha mchod pa'i rim pa dang po'o/ /phyogs skyong la mchod na yang de'i snying gar rdzogs par bkod la bsang gtor dang / zhal bsil byas te/ de nas mchod pa lngas mchod de/ de nas
<p>179b</p>
<p>179b.1</p>yam shing nas mar dang rim pa bzhin mchod do/ /tha mar mar gyis mchod de/ in+d+ra ye la sogs pas mchod do/ /de nas thab bsangs la/ be con gyis g.yab cing / na mo bud+d+ha b+h+yaH/ na mo d+harma b+h+yaH/ saM g+he b+h+yaH/ oM kro d+ha bi ra bi ra sa ma ye/ A gad dza A gad dza/ oM AHhUM i daM pre to A
<p>179b.2</p>sa naM kri pra pre tod+ka te ni swA hA/ oM AH hUM zhes sku bsang ngo / /oM ai ka bi ya mAn+ta ka bi sa ra swA hA/ zhabs bsil lo/ /na mas+sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH pre ta mu ka kha da kha da swA hA/ gdan phul la thab tu bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas mar gyi dgang blugs dbul lo/ /de nas mchod
<p>179b.3</p>pa lnga dbul lo/ /de nas yam shing / de nas mar/ de bzhin du shing thog yan chad dbul lo/ /oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM shAn+tiM ku ru oM/ /zhi ba'o/ /swA hA puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'o/ /ho ba shaM ku ru ho/ /dbang ngo / /phaT mA ra ya phaT/ 
<p>179b.4</p>drag po'o/ /sngags de gcig pus dbul lo/ /sngags rang gi so so ba yang rung ngo / /tha mar yang mar gyi dgang blugs dbul lo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga dang bstod pa bya ste/ dngos grub gsol la gshegs su gsol te/ bsang gtor dang / zhabs bsil te/ gats+tsha zhes
<p>179b.5</p>btang ngo / /de nas yang 'jig rten pa'i sngon bzhin du bsams la sngon bzhin rdzas lhag mchod do/ /tha mar mar gyi dgang blugs la las bskul zhing lan mang du dbul lo/ /de nas mchod pa lngas mchod do/ /bstod pa yang brjod la de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas bsang
<p>179b.6</p>gtor byas nas zhal bsil la/ gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas rdzas bsdu'o/ /tshe bsring bar 'dod na/ rgyas pa'i thab khung du dUr ba'i sngags kyis dUr ba'i mar la bsnyug cing lan grangs mang du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'bru 'phel bar 'dod na 'bru'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de
<p>179b.7</p>la sogs pa rtog pa dgu pa nas 'byung ba'i tshul du gang 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg rdzas gang shis pas bya'o/ /de la gsad par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rjes dang / dri ma dang / dur khrod kyi sol ba la gzugs byas te snying gar ming rus bcug nas sgrub thabs kyi mjug tu
<p>180a</p>
<p>180a.1</p>dgra bo bkug la ling ga la gzhug pa dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / gtubs te tsher ma dang / tsha bas rjes su bsrel la/ yungs mar gyis kyang bsgos nas yam shing dang / /mar gyi steng la bsreg go/ /bskrad par 'dod na bya rog gi shes bya'o/ /
<p>180a.2</p>dbye bar 'dod na bya rog dang / 'ug pa'i sgros bya'o/ /de la stsogs pa las dang sbyar ro/ /sdig pa sbyang bar 'dod na/ til 'ba' zhig gis bya'o/ /de la sogs pa spyir shes par bya'o/ /zhi ba la dam tshig dang ye shes kyi me lha dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa la ser po/ /dbang la
<p>180a.3</p>dmar po/ /drag po la sngon por bsgom mo/ /mchod rdzas dang / sngags kyi 'od zer dang / kha dog so so la'o/ /bsam pa yang zhi ba ni byams pa'o/ /rgyas pa ni rgyas par bya ba'i sems sam/ mthon po'i rnam pas 'jug pa'o/ /dbang la ni dga' chags sam zhen
<p>180a.4</p>pas 'jug pa'o/ /drag po la ni ma rangs pa dang / yid skyo ba dang khro sems so/ /las ni zhi ba la ni 'od zer dkar po 'phros pas de dag gis gang la bya ba'i nad dang / sdug bsngal la stsogs pa drangs shing bsdus nas rgya mtsho chen por dor bar bsam mo/ /rgyas pa la 'od zer
<p>180a.5</p>ser po 'phro ba de dag gang gi lus la zhugs pa de nyid kyis dpal la sogs pa de dag rgyas par bsam mo/ /dbang la 'od zer de dag dmar por 'phros te gang dbang du bya ba'i lus sems kyi rgyud bkang zhing nyams shing myos pa de dag drangs nas rkang pa'i drung du ltung ste skyabs
<p>180a.6</p>su dong bar bsam mo/ /drag po la 'od zer sngo nag dug ha la ha la ltar mkhregs shing dngos po shin tu sra ba dag kyang reg pa tsam gyis thal ba'i mthar byed pa 'phros nas/ gang la bya ba la khyab par gyur te/ skad cig tsam gyis thul gyis bsregs te thal bar gyur par bsam mo/ /yon
<p>180a.7</p>chu yang zhi ba la 'o ma'i nang du mngar gsum dang me tog dkar po'o/ /dbang la chang ngo / /drag po la chang dang skyur ba'i khu ba dang tsha ba rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor ni chu gtsang ma dang / yungs kar dang / dri bzang por sbyar la me tog so so ba'i kha dog bcug pas bya'o/ /me'i
<p>180b</p>
<p>180b.1</p>kha dog gi yi ge dgod pa yang raM dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / sngon po'o/ /dgang gzar blugs gzar la yang chos kyi yi ge 'bru/ oM swA AH hUM rnams kha dog so sor dgod do/ /rgyu yang so so la bya'o/ /me lha'i rtsa ba'i lha'i sku ni dmar ser ro/ /zhi ba'i dus su
<p>180b.2</p>pA paM ka dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po dbyug tho/ /gnyis pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya/ g.yon dang po phreng ba/ gnyis pa ril ba'am/ gun d+he'o/ /rgyas pa la ser po phyag gnyis ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dbang la 'dod pa'i me tog dmar po zhes bya ba g.yas dang po na
<p>180b.3</p>lcags kyu gnyis pa na zhags pa'o/ /bsad pa la rlung zhes bya ba sngon po/ /g.yas pa na be con/ gnyis pa na me thab/ dam tshig gi me lha nyid de ltar bskyed do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i skabs su khro bo ya mAn+ta ka de nyid zhi ba la dkar po/ /phyag dang po gnyis bum pa dkar po
<p>180b.4</p>nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dkar po gtong ba'o/ /rgyas pa la bum pa ser po nas chu rgyun ser po/ /dbang la dang po skyo zhags/ drag po la rtsal ba nyid bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /yam shing dang sreg shing yang rgyu dang tshad gcig par bya'o/ /de ni cho ga snga ma'i thun du bstan
